item.title: Little Child - www.ericproffitt.com
item.description:
This was the moving music video created by Eric Proffitt: www.ericproffitt.com about Human Trafficking...modern-day slavery. The song was rewritten and premiered at the UNGIFT conference in Vienna, Austria and performed by Canadian/US singer Eric Proffitt.
Eric Proffitt writes and sings music that fights global issues, and inspires change. Combined with the talents of the One Voice Children's Choir, and of the arrangement by Masa Fukuda, this masterpiece is becoming an anthem for the fight against human trafficking.
The video can be downloaded and shown to youth groups, church groups, for seminars, and conferences for only 1.99 at www.ericproffitt.com.
Women At Risk has permission from Eric Proffitt to use his video for Advocacy and Awareness purposes.
